summary: FRONT END FELT LOOSE AND VEHICLE WAS VEERING TO THE RIGHT DUE TO CRACKED  BALL JOINTS. ENGINE CHECK LIGHT APPEARED, AND A RED BROWN LIQUID  WAS LEAKING FROM DRIVER'S SIDE  BECAUSE POWER STEERING  RACK WAS DEFECTIVE. ALSO, DEALER REPLACED TIMING GEAR, AND UPPER AND LOWER INTAKE MANIFOLDS.*AK
